Package dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.roborally.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.roborally.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController is responsible for handling the all game request ,logic ,update the model and returns the view that should be changed.
Author:
Ekkart Kindler, ekki@dtu.dk

      public GameController(@NotNull Board board)
      This constructor takes a board as input.

  • Method Details

    • moveCurrentPlayerToSpace

      public void moveCurrentPlayerToSpace(@NotNull Space space)
      This is just some dummy controller operation to make a simple move to see something happening on the board. This method should eventually be deleted!
      Parameters:
      space - the space to which the current player should move

    • startProgrammingPhase

      public void startProgrammingPhase()
      This methode allows the player to get some random cammand cards where players can program their robot with.

    • finishProgrammingPhase

      public void finishProgrammingPhase()
      This method allows the players to finish the programing phase, and activates the activation phase, "Execute Program" and "Execute Current Register" buttons

    • executePrograms

      public void executePrograms()
      This methodes executes the all programs card of all robots.

    • executeStep

      public void executeStep()
      This methode executes the current map of the current robot, so in this way the player click step by step throughout the program

    • moveForward

      public void moveForward(@NotNull Player player)
      This methode moves the player's robot 1 cell to the forwarded in the headed direction
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose robots should be moved forward.

    • fastForward

      public void fastForward(@NotNull Player player)
      This methode moves the player's robot 2 cell to the forwarded in the headed direction
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose robots should be moved forward.

    • turnRight

      public void turnRight(@NotNull Player player)
      This methode turns the player's robot 90 degree to the right
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose robots should be turned.

    • turnLeft

      public void turnLeft(@NotNull Player player)
      This methode turns the player's robot 90 degree to the left
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose robots should be turned.

    • moveCards

      public boolean moveCards(@NotNull CommandCardField source, @NotNull CommandCardField target)
      This method allows moves the card between the commandCards fields
      Parameters:
      source - the source where the card should be moved from.
      target - the target where the card should be moved to
      Returns:
      return true if card can be moved successfully, otherwise return false.

    • notImplemented

      public void notImplemented()
      A method called when no corresponding controller operation is implemented yet. This should eventually be removed.
